ptp-instances.description: Top level container for PTP instances

profile.description: Select PTP clock profile g8265.1, g8275.1, g8275.2 or default or e2e-transparent

default-data-set.description: The default data set of the clock

domain.description: The domain number of the current domain

ptp-clock-sync.description: Initialise ptp clock from operating system clock

priority-2.description: The priority2 attribute of the local clock

slave-only.description: When set the clock is a slave-only clock

local-priority.description: The local priority attribute of the local clock

max-steps-removed.description: The maximum number of communication paths between the local clock and the grandmaster clock

domain.description: The domain number of the current domain

ptp-clock-sync.description: Initialise ptp clock from operating system clock

priority-2.description: The priority2 attribute of the local clock

slave-only.description: When set the clock is a slave-only clock

local-priority.description: The local priority attribute of the local clock

max-steps-removed.description: The maximum number of communication paths between the local clock and the grandmaster clock

clock-identity.description: The clock identity of the local clock

clock-class.description: The clock-class denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: The clock-accuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: The offset-scaled-log-variance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

clock-class.description: The clock-class denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: The clock-accuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: The offset-scaled-log-variance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

ports.description: Top level container for ports data set of the clock

port.description: List of port data sets of the clock

port-number.description: PTP port clock number. Default value is 1.
PTP port clock number. Default value is 1.

local-priority.description: The local priority attribute of the PTP port clock

description.description: This parameter is used to set port clock description

non-forwardable-mac-addr.description: Set dst mac as non forwardable mac 01:80:C2:00:00:0E

log-min-delay-req-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the minDelayReqInterval (the minimum permitted mean time interval between successive Delay_Req messages)

log-announce-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the mean announceInterval (mean time interval between successive Announce messages)

announce-receipt-timeout.description: The number of announceInterval that have to pass without receipt of an Announce message before the occurrence of the event ANNOUNCE_RECEIPT_TIMEOUT_ EXPIRES

log-sync-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the mean SyncInterval for multicast messages

unicast-grant-duration.description: Unicast grant duration field in signalling messages

delay-mechanism.description: The propagation delay measuring option used by the port in computing meanPathDelay

version-number.description: The PTP version in use on the port

master-only.description: When set the port is a master-only port

grandmaster-priority-2.description: The priority2 denotes priority2 attribute of grandmaster clock

source-ipv6-link-local-address.description: When set the clock source addrress is a linklocal address

source-ipv6-address.description: When set the clock source addrress as ipv6

source-ipv4-address.description: When set the clock source addrress as ipv4

port-number.description: PTP port clock number. Default value is 1.

local-priority.description: The local priority attribute of the PTP port clock

description.description: This parameter is used to set port clock description

log-sync-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the mean SyncInterval for multicast messages

unicast-grant-duration.description: Unicast grant duration field in signalling messages

delay-mechanism.description: The propagation delay measuring option used by the port in computing meanPathDelay

version-number.description: The PTP version in use on the port

master-only.description: When set the port is a master-only port

grandmaster-priority-2.description: The priority2 denotes priority2 attribute of grandmaster clock

port-state.description: Current state associated with the port

signal-fail.description: signal fail info of PTP port

clock-class.description: The clock-class denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: The clock-accuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: The offset-scaled-log-variance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

network-interfaces.description: Top level container for PTP network-interfaces parameters

network-interface.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port
Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port

vlan-physical-interface-name.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this vlan interface PTP Port

vlan-physical-dot1q-vlan-id.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port. The valid range for this attribute vlan-id is related to the value configured in reserved-vlan-base which defines a range of 31 reserved vlans for PTP from the configured value in reserved-vlan-base. By default the range reserved vlan values are 4064-4095. By default the maximum valid value for vlan-id is 4063.

dot1q-vlan-id.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port. The valid range for this attribute vlan-id is related to the value configured in reserved-vlan-base which defines a range of 31 reserved vlans for PTP from the configured value in reserved-vlan-base. By default the range reserved vlan values are 4064-4095. By default the maximum valid value for vlan-id is 4063.

dot1ad-vlan-id.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port. The valid range for this attribute vlan-id is related to the value configured in reserved-vlan-base which defines a range of 31 reserved vlans for PTP from the configured value in reserved-vlan-base. By default the range reserved vlan values are 4064-4095. By default the maximum valid value for vlan-id is 4063.

inner-dot1q-vlan-id.description: Reference to the configured underlying interface that is used by this PTP Port. The valid range for this attribute vlan-id is related to the value configured in reserved-vlan-base which defines a range of 31 reserved vlans for PTP from the configured value in reserved-vlan-base. By default the range reserved vlan values are 4064-4095. By default the maximum valid value for vlan-id is 4063.

master-ipv4-addresses.description: Top level container for port master-IPv4-addresses parameters

master-clock-source-ipv4-address.description: Set master clock ipv4 source address
Set master clock IPv4 source address

master-ipv4-address-priority.description: Set master clock IPv4 source address priority

master-clock-source-ipv4-address.description: Set master clock IPv4 source address

master-ipv4-address-priority.description: Set master clock IPv4 source address priority

master-ipv6-addresses.description: Top level container for master-IPv6-addresses parameters

master-clock-source-ipv6-address.description: Set master clock IPv6 source address
Set master clock IPv6 source address

master-ipv6-address-priority.description: Set master clock IPv6 source address priority

master-clock-source-ipv6-address.description: Set master clock IPv6 source address

master-ipv6-address-priority.description: Set master clock IPv6 source address priority

current.description: Indicates whether this is the current foreign master dataset

clock-class.description: clock-class denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: clock-accuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: offset-scaled-log-variance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

priority-1.description: priority-1 attribute of the local clock

priority-2.description: priority-2 attribute of the local clock

steps-removed.description: Maximum number of communication paths between the local clock and the grandmaster clock

delay-mechanism.description: The propagation delay measuring option used by the port in computing the mean path delay

log-announce-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the mean announce interval (mean time interval between successive Announce messages)

log-sync-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the mean sync interval for multicast messages

log-delay-request-interval.description: The base-two logarithm of the delay request interval

drop-counters.description: Set of PTP port drop counters

pkt-rcvd-on-bad-port-state.description: PTP pkt rcvd on bad port state

delreq-from-unknown-slave.description: PTP unicast delreq from unknown slave

announce-on-gps-ptp-port.description: PTP Announce on gps ptp port

io-type.description: Type of tod input/output. Default: output
Type of tod input/output. Default: output

current-data-set.description: PTP current data set state parameters

steps-removed.description: The number of communication paths traversed between the local clock and the grandmaster clock

offset-from-master.description: The current value of the time difference between a master and a slave clock as computed by the slave

offset-from-master-in-nsec.description: The current value of the time difference between a master and a slave clock as computed by the slave

mean-path-delay.description: The current value of the mean propagation time between a master and a slave clock as computed by the slave

grandmaster-identity.description: The clockIdentity attribute of the grandmaster clock

grandmaster-priority-1.description: The priority1 attribute of the grandmaster clock

grandmaster-priority-2.description: The priority2 attribute of the grandmaster clock

clock-class.description: The clockClass denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: The clockAccuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: The offsetScaledLogVariance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

clock-class.description: The clockClass denotes the traceability of the time or frequency distributed by the clock

clock-accuracy.description: The clockAccuracy indicates the expected accuracy of the clock

offset-scaled-log-variance.description: The offsetScaledLogVariance provides an estimate of the variations of the clock from a linear timescale when it is not synchronized to another clock using the protocol

current-utc-offset-valid.description: When set, the current UTC offset is valid

current-utc-offset.description: The offset between TAI and UTC when the epoch of the PTP system is the PTP epoch, i.e., when ptp-timescale is TRUE; otherwise, the value has no meaning

leap59.description: When set, the last minute of the current UTC day contains 59 seconds

leap61.description: When set, the last minute of the current UTC day contains 61 seconds

time-traceable.description: When set, the timescale and the currentUtcOffset are traceable to a primary reference

frequency-traceable.description: When set, the frequency determining the timescale is traceable to a primary reference

ptp-timescale.description: When set, the clock timescale of the grandmaster clock is PTP; otherwise, the timescale is ARB (arbitrary)

time-source.description: The source of time used by the grandmaster clock

ptp-time-of-day.description: PTP time of day expressed as Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

utc-offset-dates.description: PTP UTC leap - date and time configuration

utc-date.description: UTC date when applying leap seconds

offset-seconds.description: UTC leap - offset in seconds input
UTC leap - offset in seconds input

enable.description: Use this attribute to debug the ptp process.
Use this attribute to debug the ptp process.

terminal-debug-status.description: This attribute indicates the terminal ptp debug operational state.

interfaces.description: container for interface level configuration for PTP

interface-name.description: Use this attribute to perform platform's interface PTP related configurations
This attribute describes the textual name of the interface

hw-timestamp.description: Use this attribute to set the Hardware timestamp

interface-name.description: This attribute describes the textual name of the interface

hw-timestamp.description: Use this attribute to set the Hardware timestamp
